You may also be given compliance rules if they apply to your particularly assigned Hua client. These rules (if any) will be found in your optional field 4 or at the very top of this style guide.</p><p>You will write a comprehensive, engaging, fun, and informational piece that will attract traffic and leave readers thinking. Please read <strong><em><u>thoroughly</u></em></strong> through this style guide as it will detail <strong>EVERYTHING</strong> you need to know about this assignment. &nbsp;</p><p><strong>Word Count</strong>&nbsp;400-500 words</p><p><strong>Each piece must have 1 image.&nbsp;</strong>Please make sure that all images are relevant and add value to the piece!</p><p><strong>Topic:&nbsp;</strong>Please choose your topic by using the title/headline,keywords, the webpage (domain/host), and category provided in the optional field. If a domain is not provided, this just means, a host has not yet been confirmed and thus the piece should be focused on the title/headline, the keywords, and the category.&nbsp;</p><ul type="disc"><li><strong>Optional Field 1&nbsp;</strong>will have the title/headline of the article to write about. Do not change the titles given here.&nbsp;</li><li><strong>Optional Field 2</strong>&nbsp;has your keyword topic(s). Please be sure you're using these in your article naturally. DO NOT ANCHOR ANY LINKS TO THESE PROVIDED KEYWORDS. You may choose any words in your piece to anchor from EXCEPT for these keywords.</li></ul><ul type="disc"><li>Please include at least a few sentences about the keyword topic in your article; the entire article DOES NOT have to be about the keyword(s).</li><li>If there are keywords in this field that are misspelled, be sure to spell them the same way when you use those words in the article. (These misspellings are intentional for SEO purposes).</li></ul><ul type="disc"><li><strong>Optional Field 3&nbsp;</strong>includes any compliance rules for the client and/or the category the content should adhere to.</li><ul type="circle"><li>Example of a category: Business, Education, Career, etc.</li><li>Example of a compliance rule for a client: &quot;<em>Please make sure all content is relevant to money, trading, investing. If a domain/webpage is not provided please focus your piece on the other fields.&nbsp;</li></ul><ul type="disc"><li><strong>Please insert 1-3 resource links of your choice.&nbsp;The links should lead to related webpages that give more insight on your article or topic and should not be attached to the anchor text given in OF2.
